data.title: Hastings Point (NSW) sea water temperature in October
data.meta_description: We offer detailed historical data of sea water temperature in Hastings Point (NSW) in October for every day of the last 10 years with the ability to compare two different years
data.text:
Is it warm enough to swim in Hastings Point in October? Average water temperature in Hastings Point in October is 21.8°C and therefore suitable for comfortable swimming. The warmest sea in Hastings Point in October is 23.5°C, and the coldest is 19.9°C. To find out the sea temperature today and in the coming days, go to Current sea temperature in Hastings Point

Changes water temperature in Hastings Point in October 2023, 2022

To get an accurate forecast for the water temperature in Hastings Point for any chosen month, compare two years within a 10 year range using the chart below. In addition to the sea water temperature in Hastings Point, the selected years in the table also show the values of the maximum and minimum temperatures on each of the days of October.

Average water temperature in Hastings Point in October over a decade

Hastings Point water temperature during other months:

You can also view information about water temperature for other months by clicking on the month button below

Where is the warm sea water in October?

Want to know where the water temperature in October is good for swimming? Select the continent of interest, the day of the month and the required water temperature
